questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT -
You manage a Dynamics 365 Sales environment.
You need to configure the default status for each lead.
Which status reason should you associate to each scenario? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content: Correct answer is 2,2... To send new email from Outlook, select Dynamics 365 App Email Template - type Lead and new email is automatically tracked.

comments.content: Also, statement is You implement the Dynamics 365 App for Outlook, so email is sent from Outlook and not from Dynamics app

No, you are wrong.
The question is "associate with lead", insert a mail template is only the mail content, you must set the regarding manually. Adding mail activity will automatically set the regarding.

discussion.content: on exam, I believe it is 2,2 because creating a lead template will affect all leads, just editing the single timeline only affects one lead

I think it should be 2, 1. 
for the new Email first, we will create an email from the lead timeline then only we will insert the template.

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT -
You implement the Dynamics 365 App for Outlook.
You need to associate emails to lead records.
What should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

You manage a Dynamics 365 environment. A user named User1 begins work on an opportunity.
User1 asks a user named User2 to assist with the opportunity while she is on vacation.
You need to ensure that User2 can access the opportunity and that User1 retains ownership of the opportunity.
What should you do?

choices.D: Add User2 to the Sales team
choices.C: Instruct User2 to follow the record

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Without knowing the organisation's security setup it is difficult to state what the "correct" option is, because Users 1 and 2 could already be able to access each other's opps, User 2 may not have a Sales sec role, or there may not even be a Sales Team set up, etc. So the best hypothetical answer, making a lot of assumptions about the org, is answer A

comments.content: According to the option you stated - assigning a record is incorrect as it changes the ownership to user 2... makes more sense if Access Teams replace it.

discussion.content: i think the option in recent exam was ' Assign record touser 2' instead of share..which is same as sharing the record

comments.content: Rumour has it that they are using the "Access Team" option in the exam

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
We need to select Unit Group on product, When you go to Unit group table and click on +New to create new Unit group, It asks for Primary Unit and name of primary unit is copied to Unit group. So we create Primary unit first in the process of creating UnitGroup.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/create-unit-group-add-units-that-group

Selected Answer: C
The primary unit is the base unit of measurement for a product/service. The term used in d365 is typically 'primary unit'.

questions.question_text:
A battery manufacturer wants to sell their batteries in boxes of 12 and cases of 24 boxes.
You need to set up a unit group so that the manufacturer can sell different quantities.
What should you create first?

HOTSPOT -
You are a salesperson using Dynamics 365. You receive customer phone calls and manage leads.
You need to qualify leads and send phone calls to sales representatives.
How should you manage each of the following situations? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content: When converting Case, two options appear in dropdown (Opportunity or Case), see link - https://community.dynamics.com/crm/f/microsoft-dynamics-crm-forum/316026/phone-to-case-conversion?pifragment-97030=1
I tested in D365, seems it is now available to convert call to Case, Opportunity & Lead. Any ideas on this question?

Tested.
A phone only can be converted to Case or Opportunity.
Answer is correct.

comments.content: I think the keyword here is 'receive customer phone calls and manage leads' where 'customer' means existing contacts

discussion.content: Is it not possible to convert a Phone call Activity into Lead? Confused!
Its possible to convert a phone call into case and opportunity.

comments.content: No, you can not convert a call phone to lead, tested in D36 online
Yes you can convert phone call activities to leads. The answer Case is still the right answer to this question though.
With a rule but not with convert button

discussion.content:
I think it is also possible to convert a phone call into a lead:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/set-up-rules-to-automatically-create-or-update-records
